hero.subtitle: Learn how to
hero.title: Put Your Retired Phone Back to Work
hero.text:
Make your retired phone smart again with the latest Artificial Intelligence technologies.

Select from our list of innovative solutions for home and businesses.

items.text: 300 million devices getting retired every year. Give them a second life.
Make it smart again with the latest AI technologies.
Connect with your friends and family devices.
No device? No problem. Buy one from Ebay for less than 50$.

concept.title: Our Concept
concept.text:
Sensor Focus is an application that makes your retired phone smart and useful again.

We use the latest Artificial Intelligence and Data Analytics Technology to bring you unique solutions that will improve your life.

With Sensor Focus you can make your phone aware of its environment and control all its cameras and sensors remotely.

You have access to a wide range of solutions that help you at home and at work.

items.title: Home
items.text: Easy to install solutions to improve home safety and family lifestyle. Create and share memories along the way.

items.title: Small Business
items.text: Monitor your store in brand new ways. Improve client service and satisfaction. Monitor performance.

items.title: Enterprise
items.text: Your first steps into the digital enterprise. Develop reliable and low cost solutions tailored to your needs.

items.caption: Just Mobile AluPocket. Digital image. Web. 1 Sep 2016. just-mobile.eu
items.title: Sensor Device
items.text: Make your phone aware of its environment and control all its cameras and sensors remotely.

items.title: Client Device
items.text: Application always looks for activity and sends an alert to your phone if it sees something.

items.title: Create Your Account
items.text: Create your account on the SensorFocus platform. It’s free and secure.

items.title: Install the App
items.text: Download and install the SensorFocus app on your retired smart phone.

items.title: Pick Your Solution
items.text: Your first steps into the digital enterprise. Develop reliable and low cost solutions tailored to your needs.

locations.title: Monitor Your Life
locations.text: Get all your info that matters in one place in a simple and intuitive “Facebook” like news feed.

items.text: Live image from the room.
TV real time status so you know they agree to your house rules.
How many hours was watched today, this week, this month.
Hourly summary of the last 7 days and last month.
Daily pattern of TV consumption so you can change the routin.

notifications.subtitle: Lets you
notifications.title:
Stay Informed,
Stay in Control
notifications.text:
You can’t always be watching your news feed.

So SensorFocus App looks for activity and sends an alert to your phone if it sees something.

featured.title: Featured Solutions
featured.caption: Wide range of solutions that help you at home and at work.

items.title: Kids Playroom Monitoring
items.text: Monitor your kids TV and video game consumption to prevent abuse.

items.title: Earthquake Detector
items.text: Get alerted when an earthquake hits your home. Immediately look for any damages with real times images from your home.
